navigators.smart.tom.core.messages

Class TOMMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • navigators.smart.communication.SystemMessage
      • navigators.smart.tom.core.messages.TOMMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable

    public class TOMMessage
extends SystemMessage
implements java.io.Externalizable, java.lang.Comparable
    This class represents a total ordered message
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TOMMessage

        public TOMMessage()

      • TOMMessage

        public TOMMessage(int sender,
          int session,
          int sequence,
          byte[] content,
          int view)
        Creates a new instance of TOMMessage
        Parameters:
        sender - ID of the process which sent the message
        session - Session id of the sender
        sequence - Sequence number defined by the client
        content - Content of the message
        view - ViewId of the message

      • TOMMessage

        public TOMMessage(int sender,
          int session,
          int sequence,
          byte[] content,
          int view,
          TOMMessageType type)
        Creates a new instance of TOMMessage
        Parameters:
        sender - ID of the process which sent the message
        session - Session id of the sender
        sequence - Sequence number defined by the client
        content - Content of the message
        view - ViewId of the message
        type - Type of the request

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Verifies if two TOMMessage are equal. For performance reasons, the method only verifies if the send and sequence are equal. Two TOMMessage are equal if they have the same sender, sequence number and content.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
